	 * @see org.eclipse.gmf.runtime.emf.type.core.edithelper.AbstractEditHelperAdvice#getAfterConfigureCommand(org.eclipse.gmf.runtime.emf.type.core.requests.ConfigureRequest)

	 * @param request
	 * @return
	 */
